column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My first experience with deep dish pizza was...cheesy
column3: perhaps. Having never had it before
column4: it's hard for me to judge the quality at Lou Malnati's. The ingredients were fresh and served piping hot
column5: so I'm guessing it's just a matter of personal preference. That said
column6: I would have preferred more topping choices
column9: now I'm just describing Pizzeria Regina in Boston. Anyways
column10: a trip to this classic Chicago establishment is totally worth it regardless of your pizza preference. Just be prepared to wait
column11: both in line and at your table for these monster pies to cook.
